headline: Coinbase (COIN) Margin Surge Challenges Bearish Narratives Despite Slower Growth Outlook
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) just posted a net profit margin of 42.4%, surpassing last year’s 31.2%, while earnings growth rocketed to 106.2% over the past twelve months, far outpacing its five-year annual average of 18.7%. Shares currently trade at $343.78, which is well above an estimated fair value of $140.6 per share, and the stock sits at a Price-To-Earnings Ratio of 27.5x, below its peer average but ahead of the US Capital Markets industry. Despite these standout profit numbers, management...
